name: Agora Partnerships
description:
Agora Partnerships works with entrepreneurs in Latin America and the Caribbean to "chart the path from idea to global impact." Agora empowers small and growing businesses through their network of strategic consultants and community partners. They also work to channel resources and access to investment capital directly to small businesses by connecting entrepreneurs with donors and investors interested in their specific industry.

Agora's work is influenced by their belief that "we need social entrepreneurs actively working to address global issues, yet too many entrepreneurs, especially those working in low-income communities, are unable to reach their potential due to unequal access to
financing and support." The organization provides workshops and support systems to "level the playing field" for entrepreneurs who are building truly inclusive business models that can move whole communities forward.

https://agora2030.org/
